"Smell-o-Matic" - A smart, voice-activated perfume dispenser that uses advanced scent recognition technology to detect and dispense the perfect fragrance for your mood or environment. It also tracks your usage and can be programmed to refill automatically when it runs low.

"Perfume Palette" - A portable, all-in-one perfume dispenser that allows you to mix and match different fragrances to create your own unique scent blends. It features a digital display that shows you the exact combination of scents you're using, and can be synced with a mobile app for easy tracking and customization.

"Eco-Perfume" - A line of natural, eco-friendly perfumes that are made from sustainably sourced ingredients and packaged in recyclable materials. The bottles are designed to be refillable, reducing waste and promoting a more sustainable lifestyle.

"Perfume Subscription" - A monthly subscription service that delivers a new, curated fragrance to your doorstep each month. You can choose from a variety of scents based on your preferences, or let the service surprise you with a new, unique fragrance every time.

"Perfume Library" - A digital database of fragrances that allows you to browse, search, and purchase scents from around the world. The app features advanced scent recognition technology that can help you find the perfect fragrance based on your preferences, and also includes detailed information about each scent, including its ingredients, origin, and history.
